content:
After discussion with Tim and team, I'm still not clear if the FL 67 - Present On Admission Indicator is or is the same as the CMS POA Indicator.
https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/Medicare-Fee-for-Service-Payment/HospitalAcqCond/Coding

Could someone confirm or deny? Who maintains FL 67 value set?
@Amol Vyas @Pat Taylor

Per the HL7 Terminology Authority, the POA codes are owned by the AHA. https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/carin-bb/CodeSystem-AHANUBCPresentOnAdmission.html. My understanding is that CMS uses the same set of codes. @Shamil @Corey Spears @Amol Vyas
